content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 5, Almería 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 5, Almería 0.
Leonardo Ulloa (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Goal!  Barcelona 5, Almería 0. Seydou Keita (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a through ball.
Substitution, Almería. Ortiz Bernal replaces Pablo Piatti.
